Package slogo.view

Class TurtleView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
slogo.view.TurtleView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, ModelObserver
public class TurtleView
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
implements ModelObserver
An image representation of a SingleTurtle. This object extends Button so that the user can click on it. If the given image filename cannot be found in the resources folder, the turtle will be displayed as a circle by default.
